name: Quasar
description: Quasar $QSR works in synergy with Zenon $ZNN to power the dual coin economy of Zenon Network, a distributed ledger technology that aims to enable a new era of decentralization. $QSR is fused to generate Plasma that enables higher transaction throughput. $ZNN and $QSR are also used together as collateral for Spwan Pillar and Sentinel nodes. $QSR can be considered a 'gas generator' for every network operation.
